com.ochafik.util.listenable
Class ListenableSupport<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.ochafik.util.listenable.ListenableSupport<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of the collections
public class ListenableSupport<T>
extends Object

Helper class that keeps track of registered CollectionListener instances and eases up the firing of CollectionEvent.

Field Summary
